Main Python Module¶

This module contains the main code that uses all the other modules to create and simulate sessions over a complex network topology

demo.create_topology()[source]¶

This function uses network.creator.NetworkCreator to create the topology required for the assignment

demo.create_browsing_session()[source]¶

This function sets up the browsing session. It sets up routing both for data and ACKs and installs appropriate applications on both the source and the destination node.

Note

This function does not set up tracing due to limitations in the NS3 Python API
